file_content.text: The war proceeds well, thanks to your help with Firestar.
I've heard the reports. Lasers raining down from the sky, shield generators in flames... Operation Firestar is a reality now, thanks to you.
You've opened up new strategies for us. I hope support from the Empire's elite becomes more common on Balmorra.
We all serve the same cause.
It should.
A cause we're now closer to achieving. You're a credit to the Empire.
Don't presume.
I understand. I won't presume to ask again.
Are we done here?
Of course. I won't ask for any more of your time, but you'll have my gratitude forever.
Operation Firestar consists of two phases: The targets must be painted, and the satellites must be fired.
Generators targeted. Weapons locked.
Aerial Assault Commander Neddis, my lord, at your service. One moment.
Aerial Assault Commander Neddis, sir. I'll be with you in a moment.
I'll be with you in a moment. We've an aerial attack underway.
Fire when ready, Hawk Leader.
Proton bombs away... generators show no damage. Should we come around for another run?
What's the use? Return to base.
There you have it--the resistance shield generators are well-nigh invulnerable. Too entrenched for our bombers, too well-armored for ground assault.
I take it you're in charge of the bombing runs.
You command the air attacks?
That's right. Just promoted... and not long for the position, unless we resolve the generator situation. Pity our "solution" is so troublesome.
Explain yourself.
It's another failed strike against the resistance... and our only "solution" is troublesome.
I'm not here to save you. If you can't fight this war, you can be replaced.
Then you've failed us, fool.
I hear the Empire doesn't take kindly to failures.
Your bosses won't like that.
Listen to me. We haven't lost this. There's... a solution, of sorts.
This planet is orbited by laser defense satellites. Most were destroyed in the invasion, but a few still function.
If we took over the laser satellites via their control tower, we could aim them at the planet and destroy the shield generators. My predecessor called it "Operation Firestar."
If you have a plan, why is it up for discussion?
Then what's the problem?
That sounds like something worth seeing.
A laser from the sky, eh?
It would be. Unfortunately, it hasn't happened yet.
So what?
Firestar was scrapped. With the resistance blasting us every step of the way, taking the control tower is impossible. And we have no alternative.
If Operation Firestar stays iced, the aerial campaign is doomed. But perhaps... you can do what a squad of soldiers can't.
If Operation Firestar stays iced, the aerial campaign is doomed. But perhaps... a Sith's wrath can do what a squad of soldiers can't.
If Operation Firestar stays iced, the aerial campaign is doomed. But perhaps... you can go where a squad of soldiers can't.
You're a mercenary. Make the impossible possible... and we'll see you compensated.
Captain Neddis to Hawk Squadron... engage maneuver X-16....
